name: De uno, pluribus
description:
This game is my submission to the 16th edition of the  Score Jam

The theme was "Clones", so I made an endless runner/platformer where you can lob your clones to catch coins, bonuses, and enemies that are out of reach.

When you reach zero clones and take a hit, you die. Try to get the best high score !

I made it alone in Unity, using these assets:

  • https://joebrogers.itch.io/bitpotion
  • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/pixel-platformer
  • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/pixel-line-platformer
  • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/input-prompts-pixel-16

Thank you to the creators of those assets for making this game possible !
